name: jazzclub-backoffice
description: The back office for Jazzclub Karlsruhe
author: Andreas Leidig

scripts.compile: cd backend && npm run deploy && cd ../batchjobs && npm run tsc && cd ../shared && npm run tsc
scripts.deploy: npm run compile && cd vue && npm run build
scripts.clean-ts: cd backend && npm run clean-ts && cd ../batchjobs && npm run clean-ts && cd ../shared && npm run clean-ts
scripts.develop: npm run clean-ts && npm run compile && cd vue && npm run serve
scripts.test: cd batchjobs && npm t && cd ../shared && npm t
scripts.install-all-modules: cd backend && npm i && cd ../batchjobs && npm i && cd ../shared && npm i && cd ../vue && npm i
scripts.ci-all-modules: cd backend && npm ci && cd ../batchjobs && npm ci && cd ../shared && npm ci && cd ../vue && npm ci
